titleStmt.title: A faithful compendium, of the birth, education, heroick exploits & victories of His Royal Highness the Illustrious Prince James, Duke of York As also the full and just account of his kind reception, and high entertainment by the Scotch nobility at Edenburgh, the metropolitan city of Scotland.

A faithful compendium, of the birth, education, heroick exploits & victories of His Royal Highness the Illustrious Prince James, Duke of York As also the full and just account of his kind reception, and high entertainment by the Scotch nobility at Edenburgh, the metropolitan city of Scotland.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
